name: enunciate
content:
enunciate verb
(PRONOUNCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] to pronounce words or parts of words clearly: He doesn't enunciate (his words) very clearly.

See more results »
enunciate verb
(EXPLAIN)
[ T ] to express and explain a plan or principle clearly or formally: In the speech, the leader enunciated his party's proposals for tax reform.

Related word
enunciation
Add to word list
Add to word list
to state something clearly and often officially: [ T ] The administration enunciated a new policy on security issues.
To enunciate is also to pronounce words: [ T ] He enunciated his words carefully.
